title: How Plants Actually Grow: Cells, Chloroplasts, and Energy
summary: A beginner-friendly look at how plant cells and chloroplasts actually turn light into usable energy.

body.raw:
# How Plants Actually Grow


Your intro paragraph here...

## Section 1 – The Plant Cell

...

## Section 2 – Chloroplasts

...

## Section 3 – Energy Flow in a Plant
